blogPost.excerpt: We think it's likely you have at least a couple of contacts dotted around the globe and we know how difficult it can be keeping track of lots of different time zones. ⠀ Now you can add your contacts and never schedule a call over dinner or bath time again!
blogPost.body: We think it's likely you have at least a couple of contacts dotted around the globe and we know how difficult it can be keeping track of lots of different time zones. ⠀ Now you can add your contacts and never schedule a call over dinner or bath time again!
blogPost.title: Time Zone Pro - A beautiful world clock app for iPhone, iPad, and Mac
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 我们认为，您可能至少有几个联系人分布在全球各地，我们知道要跟踪许多不同的时区是多么困难。⠀ 现在您可以添加您的联系人，再也不用在吃饭或洗澡时安排电话了。
localize.tagline: 一款适用于iPhone、iPad和Mac的漂亮的世界时钟应用。

localize.description: 我們認爲，您可能至少有幾個聯繫人分佈在全球各地，我們知道要跟蹤許多不同的時區是多麼困難。⠀ 現在您可以添加您的聯繫人，再也不用在喫飯或洗澡時安排電話了。
localize.tagline: 一款適用於iPhone、iPad和Mac的漂亮的世界時鐘應用。

previous.excerpt: Yuzu lets anyone build human-in-the-loop business processes without code. We combine powerful automations & integrations with the people-orchestration of a project management tool to keep your processes running to schedule.
previous.title: Yuzu - Build complex, human-in-the-loop processes without code

localize.description: Yuzu让任何人都可以在没有代码的情况下建立人在圈内的业务流程。我们将强大的自动化和集成与项目管理工具的人员编排相结合，使您的流程按计划运行。
localize.tagline: 构建复杂的、无需代码的人机交互流程

localize.description: Yuzu讓任何人都可以在沒有代碼的情況下建立人在圈內的業務流程。我們將強大的自動化和集成與項目管理工具的人員編排相結合，使您的流程按計劃運行。
localize.tagline: 構建複雜的、無需代碼的人機交互流程
